profile.title: AI Engineer Specializing in AI Agents
profile.summary: Innovative AI Engineer with a strong academic foundation and hands-on experience in artificial intelligence, machine learning, and software development. Pursuing a Master's in Artificial Intelligence for Smart Sensors and Actuators at Deggendorf Institute of Technology, with a focus on neural networks, system design, and cloud computing. Proven expertise in deploying AI-driven solutions such as sentiment analysis models, computer vision applications, and predictive analytics. Currently seeking an internship opportunity in the field of LLM fine tuning.

responsibilities: Ensured smooth transition to new single point server safety.
Analyzed workstation post installation and resolved HTTP filtering issues.
Documented installation processes and provided remote support to employees.

projects.name: Tractor Supply Application (TSC Project Infosys)
responsibilities: Developed a React Native application for a US-based client specializing in sale of farming equipment and supplies.
Part of a team of five front-end developers, overseeing the UI development for Android and iOS platforms.
Implemented CI/CD processes using Jenkins and managed deployments for React Native applications.
Technologies used: React Native, Bitbucket, Jenkins, Android Emulator, Jira.

projects.name: Akshaya Project
responsibilities: Monitored and analyzed five international e-commerce websites, including Nike, to identify and report payment and UI related issues.
Collaborated closely with back-end teams to resolve issues, prioritizing payment bugs.
Generated detailed bug reports and created tickets using Atlassian Jira.
Daily documented crash reports of websites.
Technologies used: Firebase by Google, Jira.

projects.name: Bug Fixing and Reporting
responsibilities: Fixed UI bugs in landing pages.
Generated detailed bug reports and recreated issues for resolution.
Managed issue tracking and resolution through Atlassian Jira, ensuring effective communication and resolution tracking.

details: Improved website performance by optimizing HTML, CSS, and JavaScript code for faster load times and better SEO ranking.
Managed content updates and ensured alignment with SEO best practices.
Monitored campaign performance and website analytics using Meta Business Suite.
Generated detailed reports highlighting key performance indicators (KPIs) to guide strategic decision-making and marketing efforts.
Technologies used: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Meta Business Suite.
